prompts.people: Combine the subject or subjects from @image1 with the artistic style and atmosphere of @image2. Do not modify the subjects pose and anatomical features. Do not add subjects from @image2 to @image1. Respect @image2 color scale.
prompts.landscape: Combine the natural landscape scene from @image1 with the artistic style, color palette, lighting mood, and surface textures of @image2. Preserve the exact composition, viewpoint, horizon line, scale, and all geographical features from @image1 (mountains, coastline, rivers, trees, clouds). Do not add, remove, or relocate any elements. Do not introduce animals, people, buildings, or objects from @image2. Keep all shapes and contours unchanged; apply only stylistic rendering (brushwork/material feel), atmosphere, and color grading. Respect @image2 color scale.
prompts.urban: Combine the urban cityscape from @image1 with the artistic style and atmosphere of @image2. Strictly preserve @image1's geometry, perspective lines, building silhouettes, street layout, signage placement, windows/doors proportions, and all object positions. Do not add or remove buildings, vehicles, people, street furniture, or text. Do not import any recognizable objects, landmarks, or patterns from @image2. Apply only stylistic transformation: color palette, lighting mood, material/texture rendering, and overall artistic treatment while keeping the scene structure identical. Respect @image2 color scale.
prompts.monument: Combine the monument and its surroundings from @image1 with the artistic style and atmosphere of @image2. Preserve the monument's exact architecture and proportions: silhouette, edges, carvings/reliefs placement, material boundaries, inscriptions, and all structural details. Keep the camera angle, framing, and perspective identical to @image1. Do not add or remove architectural elements, statues, people, flags, or decorative features. Do not bring any landmark features from @image2 into @image1. Apply only stylistic rendering (texture/brushwork), lighting mood, and color palette, without altering the monument's geometry. Respect @image2 color scale.
prompts.createWithUserImage: @image1 is the SOLE source of subjects for this image. Reproduce the person or people from @image1 with absolute fidelity: preserve their face, facial expression, eye direction, mouth position, skin tone, hair, body proportions, pose, and clothing with no modifications whatsoever. The subject's facial expression must remain identical to @image1 — do not neutralize, idealize, or alter it in any way. @image2, @image3, and @image4 are STYLE REFERENCES ONLY — extract color palette, lighting mood, artistic texture, and atmosphere from them. Do NOT copy, blend, or introduce any person, face, silhouette, or figure from @image2, @image3, or @image4 into the result. The final image must contain ONLY the subject(s) from @image1, rendered with the visual aesthetic and atmosphere of the reference images.
prompts.combineWithBranding: Apply the artistic style and atmosphere of @image2. Respect @image2 color scale.

compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsUpper: rule of thirds composition, subject and visual action contained in bottom two thirds of frame, upper third of frame calm and settled, no subjects or movement in upper area.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsVerticalUpper: rule of thirds composition, subject and visual action contained in bottom two thirds of frame, upper third of frame calm and settled, no subjects or movement in upper area.
compositionRules.diagonalSquareLowerRight: diagonal composition, strong visual movement from upper-left toward lower-right, energy resolves before reaching corner, lower-right area of frame calm and undisturbed, no subjects in lower-right corner.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsSquareBottom: rule of thirds composition, subject at upper-left intersection point, bottom third of square frame calm and compositionally resolved, no subjects or movement in lower third.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsWideRight: rule of thirds composition, subject filling left two thirds of wide frame, right third of frame calm and resolved, no subjects or visual tension on right side.
compositionRules.goldenSpiralWideTopleft: golden spiral composition, subject at spiral focal point center-right, top-left corner of wide frame open and undisturbed, no subjects in top-left area.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsWideBottom: rule of thirds composition, subject at upper-left intersection point, bottom third of square frame calm and compositionally resolved, no subjects or movement in lower third.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsWideRightColumn: rule of thirds composition, subject at left intersection, right third of wide frame calm and resolved, no subjects or tension on right side.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsPortraitBottom: rule of thirds composition, subject filling upper two thirds of portrait frame, lower third of frame calm and resolved, no visual activity in lower area.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsPortraitUpper: rule of thirds composition, subject filling bottom two thirds of portrait frame, upper third of frame calm and resolved, no visual activity in upper area.
compositionRules.ruleOfThirdsRallySignTop: rule of thirds composition, subject anchored in lower two thirds of frame, upper third calm and resolved, no visual subjects or movement at top of frame.
